question: Which of the following is known as the leg-stump?
option1: The stump on the same side as batsman’s legs
option2: The stump in the centre of the three stumps
option3: The stump on the side of batsman’s bat
option4: The stump on either side of the middle stump
answer: The stump on the same side as batsman’s legs
explanation: There are three stumps in the game of cricket each having a specific name. The leg-stump is the one on the same side as the batsman’s legs. The one on the other end is known as the off-stump.
